description: From the short time using this app I very much prefer the clean and simple look to VLC. Also VLC is laggy and buggy for me when playing on other than 1.0x speed and this does not happen with this app at all. Just works and is perfect match for the GNOME DE. Recommend!
It looks amazing, hopefully you can add more features with the time.
Starts quick, looks great, and gets out of the way!

Very nice player. Videos look really crisp. Picture quality look better then VLC's. At least to me that is. Great player for watching individual videos.

Add the ability to add folders not just files so I can binge watch my favorite T.V. shows. Then I'd seriously consider replacing VLC with it.

Great job Dev/Devs. Keep up the great work.
this app is great, IMHO best looking GTK4 player as of now. Just wish there was an ability to change subtitle font size.
